articles.description: The Verge looks back at some of our most (and least) favorite entertainment and events of 2022. We’ve got roundups of our favorite movies and series from Netflix, Disney Plus, Amazon Prime, and other streaming services as well as our favorite games for the Sw…
articles.content: Nobody can say that 2022 was an uneventful year. But if you wanted to escape reality occasionally by playing a really great game, enjoying a fantastic movie, or marathoning an exciting series, there … [+759 chars]
